participant_1.background:
I had to put my dog down.
i aspire to be a millionaire.
i watch every football game at alabama.
i prefer the simpler times.
i like to go on long hikes.

participant_2.background:
I've been estranged from my parents for many years.
I am short for my age, but I am strong and fit.
I once swam across a river to get back to my car after getting a speeding ticket.
i love horses.
i have a garden in my yard.

content.text: I had to put my dog down recently. It was so hard.
I'm so sorry to hear that. I know how much that hurts.
Thanks. It was really hard. I had him for 10 years.
I can only imagine. I've had my horses for 15 years.
I'm sure that's hard too. Horses are like family.
They are. I love them more than anything in the world.
I wish I could have a horse. I've always wanted one.
You should get one! They're amazing animals.
I hope so. They're really great companions.
Thanks. I'll keep that in mind.
